subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: Note that in Chinese scripts (simplified/traditional), the left component is written [[㇐]] followed by [[㇙]] (with an upward hook). In Japanese, Korean and Vietnamese scripts the left component ends with [[㇟]] as in [[七]].
